name: How High the Moon
description: This is the first fiction I've ever written and "game" I've ever made, so big thanks to Venus Patrol for arranging this event. Honestly, I'm kind of embarrassed about uploading this. Very little of this project turned out the way I intended but I'm just glad to have gotten anything done at all given that I only started work on it a couple of days ago. Any pointers would be much appreciated. Thanks.
